FROM kbMember a left join kbMemberPhone b on b.kbmmSeq = a.kbmmSeq left join kbMemberEmail c on c.kbmmSeq = a.kbmmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.kbmpDefaultNy = 1 AND c.kbmeDefaultNy = 1
AND kbmmDelNy=1 AND kbmmDelNy=0
AND kbmmName LIKE concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') AND kbmmId LIKE concat('%', #{shValue}, '%')
AND kbmmDob BETWEEN #{shStartDate} AND #{shEndDate}
mapper.select: SELECT kbmpSeq ,kbmpDefaultNy ,kbmpDeviceCd ,kbmpTelecomCd ,kbmpNumberFull ,kbmpDelNy FROM kbMemberPhone WHERE 1=1 AND kbmpDelNy = 0 AND kbmmSeq = #{kbmmSeq}

select a.kbmmSeq ,a.kbmmId ,a.kbmmName ,a.kbmmDob ,a.kbmmGenderCd ,a.kbmmPassword ,a.kbmmSavedCd ,a.kbmmGradeCd ,a.kbmmKoreanNy ,a.kbmmEmailConsentNy ,a.kbmmSmsConsentNy ,a.kbmmUseConsentNy_c ,a.kbmmPersonalinfoConsentNy_c ,a.kbmmPersonalinfoConsentNy_s ,a.kbmmOfferinfo1ConsentNy_s ,a.kbmmOfferinfo2ConsentNy_s ,a.kbmmdormancyNy ,a.kbmmKoreanNy ,a.modDateTime ,a.modDateTimeSvr ,a.regDateTime ,a.regDateTimeSvr ,b.kbmpTelecomCd ,b.kbmpDefaultNy ,b.kbmpNumberFull ,b.kbmpDeviceCd ,c.kbmeEmailFull ,d.kbmaZipcode ,d.kbmaAddress1 ,d.kbmaAddress2 ,d.kbmaZipcode_abroad ,d.kbmaAddress1_abroad ,d.kbmaAddress2_abroad ,d.kbmaDefaultNy FROM kbMember a left join kbMemberPhone b on b.kbmmSeq = a.kbmmSeq left join kbMemberEmail c on c.kbmmSeq = a.kbmmSeq left join kbMemberAddress d on d.kbmmSeq = a.kbmmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.kbmmSeq=#{kbmmSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE kbMember SET kbmmDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND kbmmSeq=#{kbmmSeq}
